channel.title: Need help changing autosave time from 1minute
channel.description:
i have a project v16 source i think tht is testscape not sure can any one hellp me ????i want to change it to eveyr 20seconds.
P.S First to tell me will get mod on that server.
thanks chris

item.title: Need help changing autosave time from 1minute
item.dc:creator: @19chris92 19chris92
item.description:
@19chris92 wrote:

any 1 else dident work[br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2007, 02:17:23 PM[/size][hr]please some 1 change tht like whiteboy said andd still saves every 2mins[br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2007, 03:21:12 PM[/size][hr]please some 1.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing autosave time from 1minute

item.title: Need help changing autosave time from 1minute
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I could try and find you how to change if you want. :|[br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2007, 07:07:27 PM[/size][hr]Go into Client.Java and search for:

savecounter++;

Underneath that is

savecounter++; if(savecounter >= 120 && AutoSave == false) { AutoSave = true; sendMessage("Auto Save Successfull!"); savecounter = 0; }
Change it to:

savecounter++; if(savecounter >= 60 && AutoSave == false) { AutoSave = true; sendMessage("Auto Save Successfull!"); savecounter = 0; }
And it shoudl be done, compile then run your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing autosave time from 1minute

item.title: Need help changing autosave time from 1minute
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Testscape and Project 16 are totally different, and if it autosaves there must be a file that controls the time. Try looking in client .java or Player.java
